#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long LL;
typedef vector<int> VI; 
typedef vector<VI> VVI; 
typedef pair<int,int> PII; 
#define sz(a) int((a).size()) 
#define pb push_back 
#define all(c) (c).begin(),(c).end() 
#define tr(c,i) for(typeof(c).begin() i = (c).begin(); i != (c).end(); i++) 
#define fi(i,a,b) for(typeof(b) i=a;i<b;i++)
#define fd(i,a,b) for(typeof(a) i=a;i>=b;i--)
#define ff first
#define ss second
#define mp make_pair

void optimizeIO()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);
}
vector<int> v(1000023, 0), cnt(1000023, 0);
void seive()
{
    for( int i=2; i<1000023;i++)
    {
        if(v[i]==0)
        {
            cnt[i]++;
            for(int j = 2*i; j<=1000022;j+=i)
                v[j]=1;
        }
    }
    for(int i = 0; i<1000022;i++)
        cnt[i+1]+=cnt[i];
}
int main()
{
    optimizeIO();
    LL t, x1, x2;
    cin>>t;

    seive();
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>x1>>x2;
        cout << cnt[x2]-cnt[x1-1] << endl; 
    }
    return 0;
}
